query: I want to build a skill that audits Python type safety across a codebase
expected_behavior: Agent recognizes this as a skill creation request from natural language
Agent auto-detects Develop (new) mode (no explicit keyword, but describes a new skill idea)
Agent derives a name suggestion from the description (e.g., 'type-safety-auditor')
Agent asks user to confirm the name before scaffolding
Agent follows the same 6-step unified workflow as explicit invocation
Agent does NOT confuse this with an MCP server request or agent creation
